attributes.additional_details:
I want to Police to stop arresting Britain First Leader Paul Golding, simply for doing his job.
Britain First are a completely legal party. They are trying to protect Britain.
Muslims are the real villains. Remember grooming gangs?
The government are too easy on them. Muslims only need to say, they are offended by British doing something they do not and get their way! This is not their country and it is like the government are giving it to them.
So please do not arrest or charge Paul Golding, he is doing good.

rejection.details: This is an operational policing matter in which the Government cannot intervene
